sense.gloss: far away, distant place, a (great) distance, a long way off, afar
long ago, far back, far (into the future)
far, distant, far away, a long way off, in the distance
distant (past), remote (in time), remote, far-removed (in time)
distant (relationship or kinship), having little to do (with someone)
far (from something else in quality, degree, etc.), not similar, way off
reserve, constraint, restraint, modesty, diffidence, hesitation, holding back, discretion, tact, thoughtfulness
tour (by a sports team, performer, etc.), visit
pretending to respect (someone) while in fact staying distant, keeping at arm's length, giving a wide berth
school trip, field trip, excursion, outing
distance, perspective, far and near, here and there
estrangement, alienation, neglecting to stay in contact
to go away, to become more distant, to fade away, to die away
distant view, looking from a distance
being able to see a long distance, good long-distance vision
to keep away, to keep at a distance
remote cause, underlying cause, indirect cause
unconnected, weakly related, alien, far beyond (one's means, ability)
backbiting, criticizing someone behind their back

sdata.j: ↑人間↑↓にんげん↓は↑決↑↓けっ↓して↑永遠↑↓えいえん↓には↑生↑↓い↓きられないものだ。
sdata.e: Humans were never meant to live forever.

sdata.j: ここから↑遠↑↓とお↓くまで↑行↑↓い↓けるボートが↑欲↑↓ほ↓しいです。
sdata.e: I want a boat that will take me far away from here.

sdata.j: ここから↑遠↑↓とお↓いの？
sdata.e: Is it far from here?

sdata.j: ↑国王↑↓こくおう↓はいつも↑自分↑↓じぶん↓を↑褒↑↓ほ↓めるおべっか↑使↑↓づか↓いにうんざりしていたので↑彼↑↓かれ↓らを↑遠↑↓とお↓くへ↑飛↑↓と↓ばした。
sdata.e: The king was tired of his sycophants always praising him, so he sent them away.

sdata.j: バカンスに↑行↑↓い↓くのが↑待↑↓ま↓ち↑遠↑↓どお↓しい。
sdata.e: I can't wait to go on a vacation.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓を↑敬遠↑↓けいえん↓する↑方↑↓ほう↓がよい。
sdata.e: You had better keep him at a respectful distance.

sdata.j: ↑遠↑↓とおざ↓からず↑私↑↓わたし↓が↑正↑↓ただ↓しいと↑納得↑↓なっとく↓しますよ。
sdata.e: You will soon be convinced I am right.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はいつから↑家族↑↓かぞく↓と↑疎遠↑↓そえん↓になっているのか。
sdata.e: How long have you been alienated from your family?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑夢↑↓ゆめ↓が↑実現↑↓じつげん↓する↑日↑↓ひ↓も↑遠↑↓とお↓くないだろう。
sdata.e: It won't be long before your dream comes true.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑解答↑↓かいとう↓は↑完璧↑↓かんぺき↓からは↑程遠↑↓ほどとお↓い。
sdata.e: Your answer is anything but perfect.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑答↑↓こた↓えは↑完璧↑↓かんぺき↓には↑程遠↑↓ほどとお↓い。
sdata.e: Your answer is far from perfect.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑指摘↑↓してき↓、↑中↑↓あた↓らずといえども↑遠↑↓とおざ↓からずだね。
sdata.e: Your point may be a little off target, but it certainly is close.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑考↑↓かんが↓えは↑当↑↓あ↓たらずとも↑遠↑↓とおざ↓からずだ。
sdata.e: Your guess is almost right.

sdata.j: ↑金曜日↑↓きんようび↓のパーティーが↑待↑↓ま↓ち↑遠↑↓どお↓しいよ。
sdata.e: We can hardly wait for the party on Friday.

sdata.j: ↑近↑↓ちか↓い↑距離↑↓きょり↓を↑伝↑↓つた↓えるのにはくるくる↑輪↑↓わ↓を↑描↑↓えが↓きながら↑踊↑↓おど↓り、もっと↑遠↑↓とお↓い↑距離↑↓きょり↓を↑示↑↓しめ↓すには↑体↑↓からだ↓を↑揺↑↓ゆ↓すったり、↑前後↑↓ぜんご↓に↑飛↑↓と↓んだりする。
sdata.e: They dance in circles to communicate a short distance, and shake their bodies and dart back and forth to indicate a longer distance.

sdata.j: ↑許可↑↓きょか↓なく↑喫煙↑↓きつえん↓することをご↑遠慮↑↓えんりょ↓↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
sdata.e: Please refrain from smoking without permission.

sdata.j: ↑去↑↓さ↓る↑者↑↓もの↓は↑日々↑↓ひび↓に↑疎↑↓うと↓しだな。お↑互↑↓たが↓いに↑離↑↓はな↓ればなれになると、↑自然↑↓しぜん↓と↑疎遠↑↓そえん↓になるよね。
sdata.e: Out of sight out of mind. When you're separated you lose touch.

sdata.j: ↑客↑↓きゃく↓の↑足↑↓あし↓が↑遠↑↓とお↓のいた。
sdata.e: Customers stopped coming to our shop.

sdata.j: タバコはご↑遠慮↑↓えんりょ↓ください。
sdata.e: Please refrain from smoking.

sdata.j: おタバコはご↑遠慮↑↓えんりょ↓↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
sdata.e: Please refrain from smoking.

sdata.j: ↑眼↑↓め↓がわるい↑人↑↓ひと↓は↑遠↑↓とお↓くが↑見↑↓み↓えない。
sdata.e: A person with weak eyes can't see far.

sdata.j: ↑岸↑↓きし↓から↑遠↑↓とお↓く↑離↑↓はな↓れたところに↑何↑↓なに↓せきか↑船↑↓せん↓が↑見↑↓み↓える。
sdata.e: I can see some boats far away from the shore.

sdata.j: ↑学部↑↓がくぶ↓↑長↑↓ちょう↓は、ためらうことなく↑永遠↑↓えいえん↓の↑英知↑↓えいち↓を↑選↑↓えら↓んだ。
sdata.e: Without hesitating, the dean selects infinite wisdom.

sdata.j: ↑学生↑↓がくせい↓たちは↑夏休↑↓なつやす↓みが↑来↑↓く↓るのが↑待↑↓ま↓ち↑遠↑↓どお↓しい。
sdata.e: Students are impatient for the summer holidays to come.

sdata.j: ↑学校↑↓がっこう↓は↑家↑↓いえ↓から↑遠↑↓とお↓いですか。
sdata.e: Is your school far from your home?

sdata.j: ↑学校↑↓がっこう↓は↑駅↑↓えき↓よりも↑遠↑↓とお↓いよ。
sdata.e: The school is farther than the station.

sdata.j: ↑学校↑↓がっこう↓の↑遠足↑↓えんそく↓で↑奈良↑↓なら↓に↑行↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: We went on a school trip to Nara.

sdata.j: ↑学校↑↓がっこう↓の↑遠足↑↓えんそく↓で↑十和田湖↑↓とわだこ↓へ↑行↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: We went to Lake Towada on a school excursion.

sdata.j: ↑遠回↑↓とおまわ↓しに↑言↑↓い↓うな。
sdata.e: Don't beat around the bush.

sdata.j: ↑遠↑↓とお↓まわしに↑物↑↓もの↓を↑言↑↓い↓うな。
sdata.e: Don't beat around the bush.
